sentences.en: A portion of bedrock or other stratum protruding through the soil level.
sentences.cn: 露出地表的一部分基岩或其他地层.

sentences.en: And the bedrock of that prosperity must be a growing middle class.
sentences.cn: 而这种繁荣的基石是正在壮大中的中产阶级.

sentences.en: Baby, I'm no Fred Flintstone, but I can make your Bedrock.
sentences.cn: 宝贝, 我不是摩登原始人, 可是我能做你的“床岩”喔.

sentences.en: Bedrock beneath Hebgen Lake warped and rotated, causing a seiche in the lake.
sentences.cn: 赫布根湖底的基岩发生了翘曲和旋转, 引起湖中浪涌.

sentences.en: Bedrock beneath Lake warped and rotated, causing a seiche in the lake.
sentences.cn: 基岩发生了翘曲和旋转, 引起湖中浪涌.

sentences.en: It may develop in place by the decay and disintegration of bedrock.
sentences.cn: 它可能是通过基岩的腐蚀和崩解就地生成的.

sentences.en: It took five years to drill down to bedrock.
sentences.cn: 耗时五年才钻到了基岩。

sentences.en: Marriage and children are the bedrock of family life.
sentences.cn: 婚姻和子女是家庭生活的基础。

sentences.en: Money is the bedrock for the whole economic system.
sentences.cn: 货币是整个经济体系的基础.

sentences.en: Mutual interest serves as the bedrock of our cooperation.
sentences.cn: 共同利益是中美合作的基础.

sentences.en: Mutual trust is the bedrock of a relationship.
O groundwater recharges the mine through buried outcrop of bedrock laterally.
sentences.cn: 奥灰水通过基岩隐伏露头侧向补给矿井.

sentences.en: Petroleum or oil photogeology is primarily an evaluation of bedrock conditions.
sentences.cn: 石油或石油摄影地质主要是研究基岩情况的.

sentences.en: The force - field of the barrier went down clear to the bedrock.
sentences.cn: 而结界却依然横亘在地下四英尺深处.

sentences.en: The poor old man has come down to the bedrock.
sentences.cn: 那可怜的老人只剩下最后一块钱了.

sentences.en: The weathering of bedrock produces the parent material that soils form from.
sentences.cn: 基岩风化产生的母质就是土壤形成的来源.

trans.tran_cn: 牢固基础，基本事实，基本原则，最低点，基岩
trans.tran_en: the basic ideas, features, or facts on which something is based
